original: Bliding, Carl Vilhelm, lektor, Borås, f. 6/4/91 i Almundsryd, Kronob. 1. G. 32 m. Ruth Bohlin. Barn: Carl-Ragnar f. 33, Lars Äke 36. — Stud:ex. i Växjö 10, fil. mag. 15, fil. Hc. 26, fil. dr 28, provår 23. Res. t. VA havsbiolog. station Kristineberg 24 o. 31-43. E. o. aman. v. botan. inst. 16, lär. i Falkenberg 17-19, ord. ämneslär. där 19, adj. där 28, lektor i biol. o. kemi v. Borås h. a. 1. sed. 28. Led. av Falkenbergs folksk:styr. 21-26. Skr.: ett 10-tal avh. om algernas utv. o. systematik. RNO 44.
translated: Bliding, Carl Vilhelm, lecturer, Borås, b. 6/4/91 in Almundsryd, Kronob. Married in 1932 to Ruth Bohlin. Children: Carl-Ragnar b. 1933, Lars Äke b. 1936. Educational background: High school diploma in Växjö 1910, Bachelor of Arts 1915, Filosofie Hc. 1926, Doctor of Philosophy 1928, probationary year 1923. Residency at the Kristineberg Oceanographic Research Station in 1924 and 1931-1943. Assistant curator at the Botanical Institute 1916, teacher in Falkenberg 1917-1919, regular subject teacher there in 1919, associate professor there in 1928, lecturer in biology and chemistry at Borås high school from 1928. Member of the Falkenberg Board of Education 1921-1926. Author of about ten works on the evolution and systematics of algae. Awarded the Royal Order of the North Star in 1944.
